    • Method Detail

      • random_placement

        protected void random_placement()
        Randomly places the dragon on the maze.

      • decision

        protected void decision()
        Selects a random direction for the dragon to move in. If the Dragon cannot move in that direction, it will select another one.

      • manualMove

        public void manualMove(java.lang.String move)
        Created for test purposes. Allows the dragon to be controlled manually.
